creator: WiseApp | Brain Game
descriptionHtml:
Test the ability to quickly solve the problem of correctly sorting water. Use transfusion flasks to bring the same color liquid together.

Tricky Water Sort Puzzle is a fun puzzle game in which you'll sort colorful water!

In Tricky Water Sort Puzzle, you have to pour water from one bottle to another until you have sorted all the water by color. Click on the bottles to pour water. You can only pour water if the color of the bottled water matches and there is enough space.

Peculiarities:

Many exciting levels;
No time limits;
Simple one-touch control;
Colorful graphics.

How to play:

Tricky Water Sort Puzzle is an interesting logic game in which you will sort colored water into bottles to separate them by color. Choose from four difficulty modes, or start easy and work your way up to expert. Click on the first number in the list. 4 bottles will appear on the screen, in which paints are poured in layers of different colors.

Your task: to make sure that each container has its own color. Click on the bottle, and then on the container into which you want to pour. Temporarily drain the interfering layers, pour until sorted.

Solve puzzles that involve pouring one-color liquids into flasks. The faster you cope with the initial levels, the more exciting the tests are ahead.

descriptionShort: An interesting puzzle game with sorting colored water into bottles.
title: Tricky Water Sort Color

creator: WiseApp | Brain Game
descriptionHtml:
Tricky Water Sort Puzzle is perfect for anyone who loves pouring games and bottle fill. Pouring game is suitable for players of all ages, and there are no restrictions or limitations, for adults.

Test your ability to quickly solve the problem of proper bottle fill. Use overflow bottles to collect water of the same color.

Tricky Water Sort Puzzle is a fun sorting games free in which you'll water puzzle color game!

In the Tricky Water Sort Puzzle you have to pour water from one bottle to another until you sort water puzzle by color. Click on the bottles to pour water.

🌟 Peculiarities:

🧪 Many exciting levels
🧪 No time limits
🧪 Simple one-touch control
🧪 Colorful graphics
🧪 Free
🧪 Offline
🧪 Suitable for adults

Sorting games can be called an obstacle course for the brain, they develop not only logical thinking, but also ingenuity, because it is ingenuity that often helps to find a solution, and not special knowledge.

🌟 Pouring game are good at stimulating thinking processes, so they can act as a simulator for your brain. Improving memory plays a particularly important role in brain training. Over the years, a person's memory weakens very much and it becomes more and more difficult to keep a large amount of information in the head.


🌟 How to play:

Tricky Water Sort Puzzle is an interesting sorting games in which you will bottle drop pouring game. Choose from four difficulty modes, or start easy and work your way up to expert. Click on the first number in the list. 4 bottles will appear on the screen, in which paints are poured in layers of different colors.

🌟 Your task: make sure that each bottle has its own color.

As you solve this logic puzzle, your mind is constantly working on the solution. This helps to improve mental clarity, learn to build a chain of logical reasoning.

Increased concentration
In addition to improving concentration, playing can also help increase concentration levels. These puzzles require you to focus on one thing at a time, not many different things at the same time.

Helps relieve stress
Playing sorting games free can also help relieve stress, because during this bottle fill the brain switches from environmental stimuli to finding the right solution to the current hand. It's a great way to take your mind off stressful situations or everyday worries and focus on something more relaxing, like solving logic puzzle.

In conclusion, it will really help you train your brain, develop logical thinking and memory.
